node.detail_zh: 患者為長者家居上門服務照顧員，居於慈雲山慈正邨，經衛生署安排深喉唾液測試後確診，潛伏期間曾到 2 至 3 個家庭服務。（衛生防護中心於 7 月 23 日記者會表示患者居於慈正邨，為一名長者照顧員，惟於當晚新聞稿患者的住址為「待定」，故患者的職業 / 資料有待確定。）
node.detail_en: The patient is a door-to-door elderly caretaker and resides in Tsz Ching Estate, Tsz Wan Shan. She was diagnosed positive for the virus during a deep throat saliva test arranged by CHP, and had provided service for two to three familes during incubation period. (Information to be further verified due to its discrepancy between press conference and press release.)
